name: Chicrook: The Treacherous Tour
description:
Welcome to Chicrook 2: The Treacherous Tour, a short game where a chicken explores the word to eat corn!

On your adventure, the police will try to arrest you for stealing corn. Outsmart them and outrun them! The FBI and the SWAT will chase you, too!

On your journeys, you will explore three towns and a couple of other areas with many hidden corn stashes.

Will you get to the center of the map and beat the game?

Enjoy!

(By the way, you can play the first Chicrook here. You do not need to play it to understand this one.)

(Also, the game is download only because the graphics were getting messed up in the browser version.)
